DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study compare relative effectiveness cervical manipulation , mobilisation Activator instrument treatment subacute non-specific neck pain . The secondary purpose describe adverse effect treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Relative Effectiveness Adverse Effects Cervical Manipulation , Mobilisation Activator Instrument Patients With Sub-acute Non-specific Neck Pain : Pragmatic Randomised Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Neck pain common disorder . About 70 % adult experience neck pain lifetime . After low back pain , neck pain common reason patient give seek chiropractic care , second common reason use spinal manipulation . Usually , underlie cause neck pain non-specific related particular pathology cause presenting symptom . Due uncertainty result obtain limited number study manipulation mobilisation neck pain , study need compare different therapy available neck pain . Participants study treat would normally exception type spinal manipulation . There three group : manipulation group , mobilisation group , Activator instrument group .
DOC.criteria: age 1864 year ; new recurrent episode neck pain present 4 week , longer 12 week ; neck pain could extend shoulder region upper extremity , accompany headache , neck pain painful ; patient agree take medication receive treatment neck pain course study ( paracetamol 500 mg 4 time day allow rescue medication ) ; baseline pain level least 4 11point numerical rating scale . Exclusion criterion treatment intervention 6 month prior recruitment study ; specific neck pain due fracture , neoplasm , infection , inflammatory arthropathy , radiculopathy myelopathy ; factor contraindicate manipulation , blood coagulation disorder , longterm use corticosteroid , anticoagulant medication , history neck surgery , stroke transient ischaemic attack ; plan relocate ; inability read understand English ; thirdparty liability worker ' compensation claim .
DOC.keyword: Chiropractic ; osteopathic physician ; manipulation ; neck pain ; adverse effect ; randomize clinical trial
